titleStmt.title: Some errors of the Quakers detected viz. their denial of Christ, his sacrifice, ordinances, the Resurrection of the Body, and Christ's second coming : to which is added proof tha the light in all men is not Christ : with an answer to a Quaker's praise of William Penn / by Francis Estwick ...
titleStmt.author: Estwick, Francis.

titleStmt.title: Some errors of the Quakers detected viz. their denial of Christ, his sacrifice, ordinances, the Resurrection of the Body, and Christ's second coming : to which is added proof tha the light in all men is not Christ : with an answer to a Quaker's praise of William Penn / by Francis Estwick ...
titleStmt.author: Estwick, Francis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold at several places in London,

notesStmt.note: "The preface to the reader" signed : Francis Estwick.

Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
